1.content:
From high above in the sky, the scene pans down to a large massive continent that seemed like an island far away but was very massive up close. This was Saga. It is a place of unlimited potential and can bring many changes to people be they from here or from some place far far away. There are five ways to interact with Saga as a whole.

1. Being a King or Queen: Playing as the ruler of a kingdom has its perks such as free reign to explore your chosen kingdom and to attend certain royal gatherings.

2. Being Prince or Princess: Not quite as much power as a king or queen but have more of a chance to interact with those their own age in a school setting or royal event.

3. Whisked Away Visitors: People from the normal human world who were whisked away from their homes and families and brought to Saga for some unknown reason.

4. Random Residents: Normal, well Saga Normal, people who live their day to day lives trying to make a living and supporting themselves or their families.

5. Sage: Become Saga's ruler itself and change things anyway you see fit. You can become a benevolent ruler...or a power fueled dictator.

Now...pick your poison.
1.title: Welcome to Saga

11.title: Kings and Queens

choices: A royal tea with a few other rulers
Royal Meet and greet with the common berries
113.content:
Another morning soon rose on the bluest kingdom in all of Saga, the Blueberry Kingdom. Here all are blueberries, man, woman and child. Only ones kept at a normal size are the servants of the nobles and the royals.

"We wish you a bright and blue morning, our queen." two maids said as a large ball of juice was shaking as a loud yawn was heard.

"Morning." she said with a happy smile as the maids slowly rolled her out of bed.

This big ball of juice is known as Azure, the first in her name. While she is the youngest blueberry girl to ever be crowned queen, it was under certain circumstances. The previous king, King Blubus, had grown incredibly large and completely immobile. He could not fit inside of the trains of Saga nor could he move around on his own without help. So, he decided to retire and live out his days in the groves of the kingdom. It wasn't soon after that Azure was crowned queen. Though it was a lot of responsibility to grab a handle on, but she was up to the challenge.

"So...what is on the agenda today?" Azure asked one of her maids as they got her ready.
113.title: Queen of the Blueberries

132.content:
"Great set on there, Melody. You really knocked them off their feet." a stage hand said as a woman with long purple hair and a sparkly purple dress passed him by.

"Whatever, Floyd." Melody said as she returned to her dressing room as she went about reapplying her make up. "Every night is the same, nothing but stupid men who don't care about my singing but just care for my beauty." she sighed.

Melody, since she was a child, music was her life to her. She's always wanted to make it big in the music industry but all her talents have amounted to is her having sex with men in exchange for singing in a seedy little night club. Sometimes she just wishes she could just leave this life behind her.

"Guess I better get back out there." she said before noticing a spot in the mirror. "What in the..." she said reaching out before falling right through the mirror. "Ow...I better not have been slipped something."

She got up as she found herself in some alley before walking out into the street where she saw a number of people walking the streets. Cat like beings, plant people, blueberries, sumos, what could be thought of, it was there before her. "I...what is this?"

It was late in the night as a long woman in a suit with long blond hair that was tied up in a ponytail was lumbering through the streets of some unnamed city with a bottle of alcohol as she stumbled.

Her name was Jessica and she had just lost her most recent job due to a certain condition. She has a disorder that makes her have an very explosive temper that makes her act irrationally when provoked. In fact this problem has plagued her since she was a child. Causing unnecessary pain and broken bonds no matter where she went.

"Hehehe. Look at that woman. She looks like some lazy bum walking around like that." one guy said snickering.

"Yeah. She should just go and die right here in the street." another said as they were just plain laughing.

Jessica gritted her teeth as she held the bottle tight before tossing it right at them. But too her surprise, her entire surroundings had changed completely as the bottle shattered upon hitting the ground. "What...what the hell?" she slurred as she found herself...

1353332.content:
"Okay...just saying this out loud guys. This seems like a really bad idea." Marie said as she and her friends sat around in a huge circle.

"Come on, it'll be fun." her friend Carly said. "Me, Alice, Lina and Tori are on board. What about you?"

"Well....I guess. Could use a little excitement." Marie said as the five of them held hands.

"You guys think we'll really end up in some other world?" Lina asked. "Like, what would that even be like and ...will something happen to us?"

"Its possible. This spell was only attempted a few decades ago and no ones seen the caster since. Or so the guy who sold me the world jumping kit said." Tori said.

"Well, anything would be fun given how boring the world today seems." Alice said as the circle began to glow. "Oh god, its actually working."

"Wait...something doesn't feel right." Marie said. "Maybe we should..." she said before a large flash went off right in the middle of that room.

Marie groaned as she soon awoke. She looked around as she saw herself in a grassy field. "My god." she said before looking at herself. She did a little testing of a theory and soon discovered that...
1353332.title: Marie

choices: She sets out to find her friends

One of her friends ends up finding her.
13533321.content:
Marie stretched out one arm before finding it continued to stretch out as if the arm and bone itself was made of rubber. She was freaked out at first but soon realized this didn't actually hurt her, in fact, it felt sort of strange and fun at the same time. She then turned her attention to the nearby town and saw others could do the same as her.

"Okay...this has to be the weirdest day of my life." Marie said as she read a guidebook. "So this place is called the Rubber Kingdom. One of the 170 different kingdoms of Saga. Interesting. Guess when we went to perform the ritual, something went wrong and we got separated and ended up becoming like the people of the kingdoms we ended up in...if they ended up here at all."

She soon got up as she looked around. "Doesn't look like we ended up in one place. Guess I'll have to try and find everyone. Oh but...I forgot I'm flat broke. I'll have to get a job so I can raise some money to go and find everyone." Marie said as she started doing just that for the rest of that month. After which...

13533331.content:
Nora sat outside the in her college campus learning up against a tree drawing a sort of creepy dress in her sketchbook. As much as she wanted to be a fashion designer her piers and class professor insisted that not enough people would want her style of clothing choice to make a career out of it. They may have had a point. But that’s not the only reason she designed dresses this way.

All she wanted was a cute girl to sweep her off her feet and whisk her troubles away. Someone who could appreciate her sense of style and probably serve as easy eye candy in one of her dresses.

Speaking of candy, she grabbed another candy bar from her little pile. It was her favorite, dark chocolate. Ok yes, the “dark” in the name was a bit on the nose but in her opinion it was a much purer experience than chocolate that had milk in it.

As she was about to add the finishing touches on her dress design she noticed the sky has suddenly turned to night. She hadn’t been out THAT long had she? After waking around for a bit it started to dawn on her that she didn’t know where she was at all. Eventually she found herself...

Be sure to include a love interest character in these stories. You don’t have to add them right away but be sure to at least leave it open for one.
Weight gain should be the theme in the bottom two while optional in the top three.
13533331.title: Nora: goth girl, hopeless romantic and chocoholic.

choices: A arrow came flying past her head
A strange ghost flew through the window
some zombies arose from behind it
135333311.content:
She stood in the middle of a town that seemed to have little to no people in it. She looked around for a bit before looked at an old clothing store with a help wanted sign in the front of it. "How can there be a help wanted sign if this town is abandoned? Come to think of it...how did I even end up here?" she pondered as she walked right into the store.

She looked around to see that the place had sort of a creepy atmosphere to it but strangely enough, most of the clothes remained in tact, albeit some of them were a bit torn in some places. "Hmm...a little torn but nothing I can't fix." Nora said as she sowed up some patches of cloth to the torn clothes she saw displayed. "There we go."

As soon as she was finished, she heard a creaking sound as she looked around cautiously. "What is it with me? It feels like my heart just skipped a beat.' she said as she approached the counter. "Hello? Is someone else in here?" she said before seeing the bell. "Ring for service?" she read before ringing the bell as from behind the counter...
135333311.title: Abandoned?

choices: I gotta get my fashion career started
I need to find some romance in my life
Need to know more about this place
135333312.content:
Nora soon ended up right in the middle of a city that seemed ruined at first but was just very dark. As she walked down the street, she noticed the people there were dressed just like her. Their hair colors were either black, red or just plain white. Some of the women even had strange lipstick colors. What's more is that their choice of clothing was so similar to her own, they even wore some piercings.

"Incredible. This is like a dream come true. A city where everyone is just like me." Nora said before finding a brochure case as she found out. "Punk Kingdom? Its not a city like me...its an entire kingdom! I must have ended up in another world like in those movies and books." she cheered to herself.

After a little bit of geeking out, she soon calmed herself down as she started to formulate a plan. "Okay. I'm stuck on another world with only everything I had with me when I left today. Since no one has any idea who I am, I can make a new identity for myself. Yeah. First things first though...
135333312.title: And Now She Feels Normal Here

choices: "Get you to the station. You can get home by train."
She notices the sketchbook on the ground
135333313.content:
Nora walked through the darkness before ending up running into someone. "Oh, are you okay?" a voice asked.

"Yeah, I'm fine. Thanks for...for..." Nora said as she looked at the girl before her. The girl wore a mix of black and red and her hair was completely red with some of it covering one of her eyes. She had bright black lips. But what attracted Nora most was that the girls lower half was that of a spiders. A large exoskeleton bottom with 8 long legs with a rose like design on the shell. But Nora somehow found her...somewhat cute.

"Something wrong?" the girl asked.

"It's nothing. I was just...Let me just start over. I'm Nora." Nora said.

"I'm Widow." the spider girl said. "Given the way you're looking at me, you aren't a usual visitor to the Spider Kingdom." she giggled.

"Spider Kingdom?" Nora said as she noticed others who were just like Widow. "I've...ended up in some other world." she muttered. "Uh yeah. I'm not from around here at all."

"Well here. Least I can do is help you out. I'll..." Widow said.
135333313.title: The girl with the Spider's Body

1353333133.content:
Widow's eyes travelled downward, and she noticed Nora's open sketchbook on the ground. She bent her 4 front spider legs to kneel down and pick the book up.

"Oh, um, I like sketching clothes." Nora said.

"These designs are yours?" Widow asked, flipping through the book.

"Yeah, but they're freaky designs." Nora admitted. "People keep telling me to no one will want-"

"These look amazing!" Widow said. "So dark and gothic!"

That made Nora stop. Someone actually liked her designs? She felt her heart soar at that.

"Thanks!" Nora said. "You're the first person to say that!"

"Really?" Widow asked.

"Yeah." Nora said. "People always told me that my designs are too dark, too freaky. I've been told time and time again that I should just give up on designing outfits. Heck, my mom wanted me to be teacher like her."

"That's not fair." Widow said. "These are honestly some of the best I've seen."

"You have no idea how that makes me feel." Nora replied.

"You've got real talent." Widow said. "You have to show these designs to the..."
1353333133.title: Nora's Talent

choices: I think I would rather design clothes privately for the Spider Kingdom
I'll go but only if you become my model
13533331332.content:
"Fashion Kingdom?" Nora asked.

"Its where all the clothes of Saga are mass produced and manufactured throughout the land. Even clothes that fit my kind as well." Widow said. "If you bring your designs there and the people like them, they'll mass produce them to all kingdoms and people will buy them. You'll get a portion of the gold of course. You could become a very famous designer." Widow said.

"I see. And are you certain they won't just judge me?" Nora asked.

"The people of Saga rarely discriminate against one another. We're a land where almost everyone can live equally despite if they have extra limbs or eyes." Widow said.

"So...how would I get to this Fashion Kingdom anyway?" Nora asked.

"The trains would be the best way. The train system of Saga is incredible. They move so fast between kingdoms. Its really the only way to get around any of the kingdoms of Saga, well besides walking. But walking is not really recommended considering the distance between many of the kingdoms." Widow said.

Nora thought it over for a bit before deciding
13533331332.title: Nora, Fashionista?

135333313322.content:
"R-really?" Widow asked, a bit shocked.

"Yeah." Nora replied. "You look incredible, and it would be fun to design clothes for someone with a spider body."

"Well, thank you." Widow said. "I'd be glad to model for you."
-----
A little while later, Nora and Widow were in a train heading for the Fashion Kingdom. Nora was sitting, while Widow was standing holding one of the rails.

Nora looked around the train. Sure enough, there were all kinds of people in the train from various kingdoms. She saw a couple of people playing instruments in the back, a few girls in belly-dancer outfits dancing along to the music. Watching were a couple of tall muscular women, a few people who looked like living dolls, and a few people who were large blue balls.

"Saga is an unbelievable place." Nora said. "So many different people around."

"We have 170 kingdoms." Widow said. "All unique in their own way."

Nora smiled. With so many different people around, Nora knew that there had to be at least one place where she could fit in. At the very least, she could get her designs out.

Her thoughts were interrupted by someone sitting next to her. Turning, she saw a woman from the...
135333313322.title: Widow the Model

choices: As they were about to get off, Nora is suddenly taken
1353333133222.content:
Nora looked over to see a woman with red skin and two horns on her head as well as a pointed tail and bat like wings sitting right next to her. She would have looked away were it not for the womans...sexy looking figure.

"My...you seem like a cute one. What say you and I get a cabin to ourselves?" she asked Nora as she stroked a finger under Nora's chin.

"I...uh...uh...uh..." Nora started before Widow pulled her to her side.

"I'm sorry but she's taken." Widow said.

"Understood. Let me know when you decide to trade up." the demoness said as she left her number on the seat as she walked off.

"You really shouldn't mess with folks from the Demon Kingdom. May have been one night of pleasure but you could have ended up becoming her slave for all eternity." Widow said.

"Oh...thanks. I can't believe how sexy she was. I couldn't help but consider." Nora said.

"Trust me, appearances aren't worth a dime here. All that matters is the determination someone has." Widow said as the train stopped.

choices: ...get out and explore the Gluttony Kingdom.

"The transformation is already underway." The scientist explained. "First, her body chemistry completely changes so that she can never lose a pound. Then, she'll start taking on more demonic traits, like a demon tail and demon eyes. Next, she'll start becoming more obsessed with her own fat and food, determined to become even fatter. Finally, she'll gain the ability to tempt others to become gluttons. At that point, the change is complete, and she'll be a demon forever."

"There has to be some way to help her!" Psy yelled.

"Well, the first part is already underway." The scientist said. "But there is a way to stop the transformation and keep her human. To do that, you have to..."
145322212222.title: Demonic Change

choices: We'll sneak you through the window
I'll hide you in a crate marked for delivery there
We'll paint you and present you as a statue
1453222122223.content:
"Sage? As in the ruler of all of Saga entirely?" Psy asked.

"Yes. Sage possesses power that is beyond compare. Some might even consider her godlike. She controls everything within Saga. She has been known to reverse a curse or two. However seeing her is another issue since..." the man said.

"Since she is rarely seen and does not tend to leave her castle. And that castle has the heaviest guard in all of Saga. Just curious...what would be the consequence if I just let her become a demon here?" Psy asked.

"She would be discovered and put to death almost immediately." the doctor said.

"Right..." Psy said looking to Jane as she thought she saw horns starting to develop. "Oh I am really making leaps now."

The two were soon on a train bound for the Central Kingdom. "Sage...the Sage. Its like meeting our goddess." Jane said.

"In a way she is. She did create this entire continent after all. But I hear she doesn't play favorites." Psy said. "Problem is getting you inside. The castle has the heaviest guard in all of Saga and they don't usually allow visitors. So..."
1453222122223.title: Saga's Ruler

14532221222231.content:
"The window? Seriously? Look at me, there's no way I can fit my fat ass in any window! I barely got through the train door!" Jane yelled.

"I know it seems like a long shot, but it's the only chance we have right now." Psy said. "Unless you want to spend the rest of your life as a demon, constantly on the run."

"I don't!" Jane yelled. "...fine. What's our plan?"

"The castle is the most guarded place in Saga, but from what I've heard, there are some blind spots. The guards are numerous, but there are two places in the entire castle that lack 24 hours watches: Sage's personal quarters, and the library." Psy explained. "Getting into the personal quarters directly is not possible, so we'll have to use the library. From there, it's only one corridor to Sage's quarters."

"And what am I going to do when I get in the library? I can barely walk." Jane said.

"I'm going in too, so I'll help you out." Psy said. "...we're here."
---------
It was nightfall when the two arrived. In that time, Jane's horns got larger, and she had the beginnings of a demon tail. Time was running short.

The two had managed to avoided some patrols, and found a window into the library. Psy went in first, and started helping Jane in as well. After a minute...
14532221222231.title: In the Window

choices: Get Away from Lady Sage, trespasser
145322212222312.content:
"Ugh. Ugh..." Jane groaned as she tried to push herself through the window but the lack of exercise and the massive weight she put on made her weak.

"Oh, come on." Psy sighed as she tried to pull Jane in.

"I told you I was too fat for the window. The moment they see my fat ass they're gonna be all up in here." Jane said.

"All right. Calm down. I'll just..." Psy said before running into someone. "Hey, watch where..." she said before looking up. In a massive shock, she saw Sage herself standing before her. "Lady Sage..."

"Uh...greetings." Jane said.

Sage waved her hand as the window holding Jane widened as Jane found herself falling right into the library. "You two are trespassing in my castle." Sage said sternly.

"Please forgive us. We mean no harm. We simply wish to cure my friend." Psy said pointing to Jane.

"Ah...she has the demon's curse. Meaning she is a criminal. Very well...I will have to fix her myself." Sage said putting a hand on Jane as a light consumed her. When it subsided, Jane was now skinny one more and not simply trace of demon remained within her.

"Jane, you're back. Jane?" Psy asked as Jane stared at her before speaking.
145322212222312.title: Tight Squeeze

1453222122223122.content:
"W-what?" Psy asked, confused. After all this, suddenly Jane turns on her?

"Your from the Gluttony Kingdom!" Jane yelled. "You're just going to steal all my food, aren't you?"

"Sage, what's going on?" Psy asked the ruler of Saga. "Why's Jane acting like this?"

"I removed the curse, but you still committed the crime of trespassing in my castle. So I took the liberty of removing many of Jane's memories. She is no longer turning into a gluttony demon because she no longer remembers being imprisoned." Sage replied. "But she does remember you being a prisoner."

"Lady Sage!" Jane yelled, shocked. "I'm honestly honored to be in your presence! Should we be taking her back to the Gluttony Kingdom?"

Psy panicked. Jane might not remember being a prisoner there, but many others did. If she took Psy back, Jane would be imprisioned and fattened all over again.

"Lady Sage, I deeply apologize for trespassing in your castle, but I was desperate to save my friend." Psy said. "Please, I will do anything if you restore Jane's memories."

"Hmm..." Lady Sage muttered to herself. "You do seem to care deeply for Jane. Very well, I will restore her memories. However, in exchange, you must..."
1453222122223122.title: Freak Out

choices: Follow Jane as she works as a servant to Sage
Follow Psy as she plans her revenge
14532221222231221.content:
"What?" Psy asked.

"Indeed. I find it most fitting. You will become a demon of gluttony in exchange for Jane's memory." Sage said. "It seems like a fair trade."

Psy looked hesitantly before sighing. "Fine." she said as her body felt like it was on fire. Her body grew fatter as horns and a tail grew out of her body as her skin turned a bright yellow. "There."

"Oh...one thing you should know...when I removed Jane's memories...I also removed the memories of her crimes from everyone but you." Sage said.

"What?" Psy said. "Jane, we need to..."

"Get away from me, you monster." Jane said. "I've paid my dues."

"And while I have restored some of her memories, I never said they would be exact." Sage said.

"You rotten..." Psy growled.

"Don't bother trying to tempt me to eat. Nothing in Saga will work on me...since I am its maker and ruler." Sage said as Psy simply flew right out the window and disappeared.

"Can I return to my duties as your servant?" Jane asked.

"Yes, you may." Sage said with a warm smile as Jane headed off.

Months soon passed after this hidden event transpired
14532221222231221.title: Soul for Memory

choices: ...so sexy that even Jane couldn't resist her.
145322212222312212.content:
Ever since Sage had turned her into a demon of gluttony, Psy had been stewing in anger and plotting her revenge. Most of her days were spent either tempting people into gluttony, thus turning them into Gluttony Kingdom prisoners, or stuffing her face to keep her weight up. She also found that she was completely obsessed with being obese. But she never forgot what Sage had done.

One day, after finishing both tempting a Dancer Kingdom resident, she was on her way back to the Gluttony Kingdom. Her train passed by Sage's castle, and she glared at it. She had heard that in the month since her change, Jane had become Sage's favorite servant.

"I've got to get back in there." Psy muttered to herself. "I've got to save Jane. There has to be something I can do..."

She thought back to the Dancer Kingdom woman she had turned to gluttony, and got an idea. She couldn't tempt Sage, but the ruler hadn't said anything about her guards or anyone else working in the castle. Which meant she could likely tempt Jane back into gluttony. She could use that to force Sage to return Jane to normal.

But there was no way Psy could get to Jane herself. But the dancer might. It was right then Psy formed her plan. She was going to fatten that dancer up to Jane's original weight of 892 pounds, then she was going to make that dancer...
145322212222312212.title: The Vengful Demon

1453222122223122121.content:
"Yes...she will make the perfect distraction." Psy smiled wicked as she watched her new subject eating and getting fatter. "No guard would be able to resist her. Then while they watch her, I can slip in and rescue Jane and bring her back to my side." she said laughing evilly. "What...is wrong with me?"

She spent the past week formulating her plan. It wasn't long before her dancer was out there, a wobbling pile of blubber as she went and danced as best she could, bringing the guards away from their posts as Psy showed herself inside.

"Heh...stupid guards." Psy snickered as she looked around. "Jane? Jane?"

She looked around searching for Jane inside the castle but was surprised when she found no trace of her. "What...is this? Where is she?"

"Not here." Sage said as a cage formed around Psy. "She's currently busy serving the nobles of another kingdom on my behalf." Sage said.

"You...you set all this up." Psy said in shock.

"I know everything that happens within Saga...this is my kingdom." Sage said lifting a hand up as Psy felt herself
1453222122223122121.title: A Distraction

choices: ...turning into a demon... but not one of Gluttony.
14532221222231221211.content:
Looking at the bars, Psy saw that that were getting taller. She was worried for a moment before she realized the bars weren't getting taller: she was getting shorter.

"Wh-what are you doing, Sage?" Psy asked, now freaking out.

"I'm punishing you for once again breaking into my castle." Sage replied. "I could just shrink you down to the size of a mouse, and let some of my pets after you to teach you a lesson, but that seems far too barbaric. Instead, I'll just do this."

With a snap of her fingers, Psy stopped shrinking. Where she had once been a fair 5'6'', she now stood at little over a foot shorter, at 4'5''. She had also shrunken in girth as well. She was still fat, but nowhere near what she had been.

"What in the world?" Psy asked.

"You look so tiny now." Sage said. "Well, I guess at my height, anyone would look tiny."

"Why would you make me so short?" Psy asked. "How is this a punishment?"

"So many questions." Sage replied. "I'm proving a point. You will never get Jane back. She's happy the way she is now."

"Only because you made her that way!" Psy yelled.

"Still, she's happy." Sage replied. "Now, get out. And I swear, if you break in here again, I'm turning you into a demon of both gluttony and lust!"
-------
A little while later, Psy was stewing in her home, sitting on the immense stomach of the dancer she had fattened, who she learned was named Laura. The fact that she was now short enough to do just that frustrated Psy.

"You know, in the years I've lived, I never thought I'd be turned into a short, fat demoness." Psy muttered. "But I'm not giving up! I will rescue Jane!"

"Um, how long are you going to be sitting on my gut?" Laura asked. "I'm getting really hungry."
-------
Unknown to Psy though, Jane's change wasn't perfect. Because over time she had found herself...
14532221222231221211.title: The Shortest Demoness

choices: Noticed a large fat woman watching her
No one was there. Just her being cautious.
145322212222312212111.content:
"Oh...seems my work has been doing a number on my figure." Jane said looking herself in a mirror as she looked a little more chubby than she did when she was cured of her demonification.

After Jane was taken in by Sage, she was sent to Servant Kingdom for a spell to become trained as a proper maid to serve anyone who would have requested of her. After attaining high marks, she became a servant of high desire and recommend. Currently, she was serving the royal family of the Bee Kingdom where she's been getting good with making honey related treats and helping herself to some of them herself.

"My...it smells so good today." said a young bee girl who walked into the kitchen.

"Oh, greetings, Princess Beatrice. I'm just finishing some prep work on some honey biscuits your mother requested." Jane said.

"Oh, fun." Beatrice said as she flew off as Jane got back to work.

"Hmm...I should see about getting some more honey from the neighboring hive." Jane said as she headed out. As she did, she felt a presence . She looked out and...
145322212222312212111.title: Chubby Little Servant

choices: "...you have been pardoned, and can leave the Gluttony Kingdom."
"...you are being punished. You must eat until you are a ton."
"...you are to help us find the child's parents."
145323.content:
During one of her many, MANY trips to the fast food places dotting Saga to sate her endless hunger, Jane was just leaving a buger joint with 10 bags filling the basket of her mobility scooter. The ONE good thing Jane could say was that, due to how the kingdom operated, nearly everything was free.

As she wheeled down the sidewalk, she saw the endless amounts of scraps lining the roads, from chicken bones to wrappers to rotten fruit. It was a disgusting, heart-breaking sight. But it was in these scraps that things changed.

She heard a soft sobbing come from one of the many piles. Driving over to it, she saw a sight that made her almost cry. Climbing out of the pile was a small child, a girl likely around 11. From the clothes she was wearing, Jane guessed she was from Simpleton, though she was stick thin.

The girl looked at Jane, then at the food in Jane's scooter. Slowly, Jane took one of the many hamburger bags out of her scooter. Her endless hunger was screaming at her to put it back, but Jane's heart told her otherwise. Jane proceeded to give the girl the bag.

"You need this more then I do." Jane said. The child smiled, took the bag, and ran off. Jane smiled. This kingdom was meant to punish, but it wouldn't stop her from being a good person. Starting up her scooter again, she drove home.
------
The next morning, Jane awoke to a strange sight: a group of people had entered her home

"What's going on here?" Jane asked, confused.

"We know what you did last night. We saw that child eating food you gave to her." One of the people said. "Because of what you did..."
145323.title: An Act of Kindness

choices: Wander Saga for the rest of her life
1453231.content:
"I'm....pardoned?" Jane asked.

"Yes. You were sentenced here because you stole food from a noble to feed yourself. However, you fed that starving child who was not even sentenced to our kingdom. That is proof that gluttony has not gotten its grips in you." one of them said.

"So...what will happen to me now?" Jane asked.

"You'll be expelled from the Gluttony Kingdom and forced to look for living elsewhere. Since you have a criminal record, you'll be forced to never take the trains, always going on foot.' they said.

"Uh...I think you mean wheels." Jane said.

"No. That scooter is of the Gluttony Kingdom. It will remain here." another said.

"Oh...I see." Jane said as she sadly got out and onto her legs. "Whoa...been awhile since I was last on my feet." she said.

"Now...its about time you were on your way. Don't want to linger here any further." they said.

Jane was soon seen walking, or rather slowly waddling as she headed outside the walls of the Gluttony Kingdom. She was not a single person all alone. She then decided what she must do next.
1453231.title: Pardon

14532313.content:
Jane wanted more then anything in the world to free the other people in the punishment kingdoms. However, she was just one person, and a person weighing almost 900 pounds at that. There was no way she could free anyone. On top of that, she still had a criminal record. If she stepped out of line, she'd surely be sent back, or worse.

So, she started wandering. It was a slow walk, with all the blubber on her body, but she was at least making progress. She decided that she would start by trying to return to her home, the Puzzle Kingdom. Before her firing, she had been a tester there for the puzzles.

The walk was extremely exhausting. It took Jane nearly 5 days to return to her home kingdom. As she walked, she realized something: despite all of the walking she was doing, she wasn't losing any weight. She knew that her weight wasn't permanent, since she had heard that previous prisoners who were released had managed to slim back down, but she was still a bit confused. Maybe she just lost weight much slower. At least, she hoped.
------
Finally, she arrived at the Puzzle Kingdom. She was beyond tired, and just wanted to find a place to sleep. However, she remembered that mearly entering the Puzzle Kingdom requiered solving a complex puzzle. And she was far too tired to even try.

She started to waddle off when she heard a voice.

"Hey! Miss!"

Turning, she saw a beautiful woman run up to her. The woman was tall and shapely, with black hair, green eyes, and olive colored skin.

Before Jane could say anything, the woman started walking around her, inspecting every inch of Jane's immense body.

"Um, can I help you?" Jane asked.

"Just from a glance, I can tell you're almost 900 pounds." The woman said. "You seemed to have walked all the way here, so I guess you just got released from one of the punishment kingdoms, and based on your body, you just got freed from the Gluttony Kingdom."

Jane nodded, very confused right now. At that, the woman smiled.

"Then you're absolutely perfect!" The woman said. "My name is Nia, and I've been looking for someone like you!"

"Really?" Jane asked.

"Yup. Girls who weigh 800 pounds or more are all the rage right now!" Nia said. "I can be of help to you. You work with me, and I can get your criminal record cleared!"

Jane lit up at that. She couldn't believe it. She'd actually be able to be a normal person again.

"Sure!" Jane replied. "What kingdom are you from that's got this "rage" right now?"

Nia smiled. "Miss, you're looking at one of the best agents in the..."
14532313.title: The Wanderer... for a short while, at least

choices: They manage to escape before reaching the black market site
They accept their fate and are sold at the black market in the Ruined Kingdom
Only Jane and three others manage to get out
145323131.content:
The Dancer Kingdom, a kingdom that is situated south of the desert region of Saga. It is a place for slave trading and training girls to become dancers for private clubs and royalty as a traveling troupe. This is where Jane had ended up. While she was still immensely fat, she believed what Nia had told her and trained her body so she could become a dancer.

"This is amazing. I've never felt so light on my feet." Jane said.

"I can imagine." Nia said. "Now this...could you follow me. We need to show you to the other girls you'll be...performing with." Nia chuckled as she lead her into a dark room.

"Hey, nice to...what...the?" Jane said before seeing several girls like her all fat and chained up. "I don't..." she said before her foot got chained. "What is this?"

"Wow...I cannot believe you bought that agent crap." Nia said. "I'm a slave trader, ya stupid fatso. You're going to be sold off as a slave. Lucky for me, pardoned criminals like you are my bread and butter." she said.

A caravan soon headed off into the desert with the girls and Jane in tow.
145323131.title: The Strangest Troupe

1453231311.content:
The caravan was making its way through the kingdoms, with the women in the back watching the kingdoms go by.

"I can't believe I was stupid enough to believe Nia." Jane muttered.

"Don't blame yourself." One of the other women said. "She tricked all of us the same way. We're all from the Gluttony Kingdom. And Nia wasn't lying when she said girls our size or bigger are popular in some kingdoms right now. It's just..."

Jane was about to say something when the caravan starting rocking. She had no time to be confused before the caravan
completely tipped over on it's side.

The women all were thrown from the caravan and landed on the ground, thankfully unhurt due to their incredible weight. Slowly, Jane did her best to try and stand, when she noticed that the force of the throw broke the chain on her ankle. After nearly 5 minutes, Jane was standing up, and saw the sight before her.

Nia had been thrown from the caravan too, and was currently being held by several figures. Jane couldn't barely tell who they were before one of the figures, a woman, turned to her.

"All of you! Get away from here!" The woman yelled.

The women nodded, and started to waddle as fast as their bodies could go. Jane was thanking her lucky stars as she waddled.
-------
A few minutes later, Jane was completely exhausted. Sitting on a rock, she was panting heavily. The dance training she had gotten before actually did help her move further, but she still had almost no stamina.

"You're getting me into a lot of trouble." She said to her monstrous gut. "And now I'm taling to my own stomach. Great."

"Hey! You alright?" A voice asked. Turning, Jane saw a woman walk up to her. Based on her clothing, Jane guessed she was from the...
1453231311.title: Luck Be On Our Side

15.content:
The scene opens to a large and massive castle that sits in the center of the Central Kingdom and in a sense, the center of Saga itself. Inside of the main royal chambers, there was only a single woman. She wore a long flowing white robe and hand long green hair that reached down past her shoulders and ended to the middle of her back.

"Ah...welcome. I did not hear you come in." she said to someone who wandered in. "Hmm? You do not know of me? I see...you are someone from beyond Saga. "A visitor perhaps."

"Uh...I guess. I just sort of woke up here. Been doing work as a writer and..." they said.

"A writer? Now that is quite interesting. Let me introduce myself and then we can see about sending you home. Besides, I think its important to have words passed down before passing on to the next life. Ah, right. You know not my name. I am Sage, I am the ruler and creator of all of Saga. And I will allow you as much time as necessary to ask me questions. Now, feel free to ask me anything. Do not hold back." she said sitting down.

The writer...
15.title: Sage, Ruler of Saga

151.content:
"My origin is it? Oh...that seems like it has been so long." Sage said conjuring up a cup of tea with just a wave of her hand. "Believe it or not, I'm not entirely human not nor was I from the beginning."

"No kidding." the writer said.

"Its true. This body of mine didn't come into existence until I arrived in Saga. Truth is, before Saga even existed or before this body of mine was made flesh, I was an AI for an upcoming MMORPG game being developed for a small video game company. But then one day, a voice came to me and asked me to come and make this game into something of a reality. I accepted their offer and found a bright light consume me and the game world. It wasn't long before I found myself within this new land created from the very game I was meant to be just a mere helper AI in. I was not in a body of flesh and blood. I took it upon myself to be this lands ruler." Sage said.

"This is all so...unbelievable." the writer said.

"Yes, though I do miss Sherry sometimes...she was my programmer." Sage said.

"Okay...next question." Sage said.
151.title: Sage's Origin
